div.p: Tomahawk Schools will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-20 School Year due to the Statewide School shutdown. All school activities, practices, and community use of facilities are canceled until schools are allowed to reopen. Updates and information regarding COVID-19 can be found here.

p.span:
Today we are recognizing March THS Student of the Month, Eric Strong! Let's give a #GoHatchets shout-out to Eric!
Thoughts from his nominating teacher: "Eric has been going above and beyond in the classroom to improve his grades in both science classes. Not only have I seen significant improvement with Eric, but with those that work around him as well. His strong interest in Earth science is...

Today we are recognizing March THS Student of the Month, McKenna Roessler!
Let's give a #GoHatchets shout-out to McKenna and find out more about her!
Role Model: I would like to thank my mom for teaching me to look at things with an open mind and see the beauty in the places and people around me, as well as to have respect for nature and the environment.
The teacher with the most impact: I...
